path: PDF Library/Locations/3AW STUDIO/3A West PC-Mac Switching Instructions.pdf
text: Switching Between Mac/PC 1. Press Select on the Computer video switch (1. Mac/2. PC) 2. Press USB switch remote button (1. Mac/2. PC 3&4 are empty) 3. Green on the left = 1. Mac; Green on the right = 2. PC; Red on left or right = 3 or 4 Not connected. (be sure to skip 3 and 4) 1 2 3 3 3
